data.eml:eml: Scandinavian Oncophorus (Bryopsida, Oncophoraceae): species, cryptic species, and intraspecific variation

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lars Hedenäs (2017): Scandinavian Oncophorus (Bryopsida, Oncophoraceae): species, cryptic species, and intraspecific variation. European Journal of Taxonomy 315: 1-34, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2017.315
